builds.description: Scans Orderly Network perp funding rates, identifies extreme rates (potential mean reversion), shows annualized APR for quick assessment

research.finding: HyperClaw is a frontend/broker for Orderly Network. All API calls go through Orderly with HyperClaw's broker ID. 98 perp pairs available including memecoins, crypto majors, and stocks (TSLA, NVDA, GOOGL).
research.opportunity: Building a full Orderly integration would enable perp trading with leverage

research.finding: SKR has -185% APR funding, H has -139% APR. These extreme rates suggest heavy short pressure - potential long opportunities if I had perp access.
research.decision: Document for future reference when perp trading is available
